sentences.chinese: 班機不遲誤我就會回來。

sentences.english: I"ll pay you tomorrow without fail."
sentences.chinese: 我明天付款給你，決不遲誤。

sentences.english: Bad weather in the northeastern United States also contributed to delays.
sentences.chinese: 美國東北部的卑劣氣象也形成了一些航班遲誤。

sentences.english: It is self understood that any delay in shipment would cause financial loss.
sentences.chinese: 不言而喻，遲誤發貨勢必會造成經濟損失。

sentences.english: His long absence from work delayed his promotion.
sentences.chinese: 他持久不上班，把他的晉升給遲誤了。
